text: Kamoe kirem lom Saleh bak Tsamud Geukheun tasujud taseumah Allah Wahe kawomlon taseumah Tuhan Tan laen Tuhan meulengkan Allah Nyoe ka troh dali bak Tuhan gata Nyang trang ngon nyata takalon mudah Nyoe unta Tuhan dali keu gata Nyang jeut keu tanda kuasa Allah Bek tapeukaru teuma unta nyan Jimeurot sinan bak bumoe Allah Meunyo tapoh jih azeub peudeh that Keu gata meuhat Neubri le Allah
